Drug Coverage

Covered drugs in your plan include most generic and commonly used brand name drugs covered by Medicare Part D. You pay no more than 58% of the total cost for generic drugs or 45% of the total cost for brand name drugs, for any drug tier during the coverage gap.

Search drugs by name to find tier listings and drug costs with your plan
